title: Tools for Advanced Bioinformatics Course
text: AvanceradBioinformatikPackage provides tools workflows data preprocessing analysis part Advanced Bioinformatics course Ume√• University. main purpose package identifying optimal spacer sequences gene knockout using CRISPR-Cas9.

title: Tools for Advanced Bioinformatics Course
text: install development version package GitHub:
code: # If not already installed devtools, run: install.packages("devtools")   # Install the package devtools::install_github("Sladderdask/AvanceradBioinformatikPackage")

title: Tools for Advanced Bioinformatics Course

code: Rscript requirements.R pip install -r requirements.txt #example usage library(AvanceradbioinformatikPackage)  result <- fun(5) print(result)
